docxodt.customCss: body { background-color: #000000 !important; color: #FFFFFF !important; } .docx-wrapper, .odt-wrapper { background-color: #000000 !important; } .docx-page, .odt-page { border: none !important; } div[class*='viewer'] { background-color: #000000 !important; } * { background-color: #000000 !important; color: #FFFFFF !important; }
